author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a `TrackerMap`-style plot for the fraction of pixel bad components from `SiPixelQuality`.
Also augmented the unit test of the package to be able to test this. 

#### PR validation:

Tested privately the following command:

```python
getPayloadData.py \
    --plugin pluginSiPixelQuality_PayloadInspector \
    --plot plot_SiPixelQualityBadFractionMap \
    --tag SiPixelQuality_byPCL_prompt_v2 \
    --time_type Lumi \
    --iovs '{"start_iov": "1594407824392193", "end_iov": "1594407824392193"}'  \
    --db Prod --test ;
```
and obtained:

![image](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/assets/5082376/e6d18694-e297-47c8-bd21-e7d46a422451)

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: SiPixel payload inspector: add `SiPixelQualityBadFractionMap`
